name: Ever-Expanding Universe
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"Captain... are you reading us?

We have a mission for you."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Ever-Expanding Universe is an interesting physics-based, vector-styled spin on the arcade classic 'Asteroids', but with a simple and effective twist:

Every time the level is cleared, the universe grows... Bigger and more dangerous than ever before.

Three lives, a brittle vessel, and a procedural generation system provide an intreguing and atmospheric store attack that will keep you coming back time and time again.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
